title: Tree icon not updated when connection lost
author: padillah
body_snippet:
The icon overlay on the connection tree does not refresh when the connection is lost.

## Expected Behavior
When a server reboots and the connection is lost the icon overlay should update to reflect the new connection status.

## Current Behavior
The icon overlay never changes. Not even after mouseover or click.

## Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)
1. Connect to more than one machine.
2. Reboot one of the machines to cause the connection to be lost
3. Notice icon overlay does not change....
